Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Average resolution time of 'Accepted + Wait' when followed by 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Total time for 'Accepted + Wait' in cases leading to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Minimum time to 'Accepted + Wait' grouped by 'country'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and the end of case grouped by the last value of resource country

Name: Average waiting time to the 'Accepted + Wait' after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment' and activity 'Accepted + Wait'

Name: Total time it takes 'Accepted + Wait' to be done before 'Accepted + Assigned'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Assigned'

Name: Average time for 'Accepted + Wait' in incidents resolved within the same day
Metric: The average of the duration between activity Accepted + Wait and the end of the case

Name: Total time for 'Accepted + Wait' across all variants leading to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Closed'

Name: Average time from 'Accepted + Wait' to 'Accepted + Wait - User' in high frequency variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Minimum time between 'Accepted + Wait' and 'Completed + In Call' across all cases
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + In Call'

Name: 'Accepted + Wait' Cycle Time in the path to 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Resolved'

Name: Average time it takes 'Accepted + Wait' after the execution of 'Accepted + In Progress' in the most common process variants
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Accepted + In Progress' and activity 'Accepted + Wait'

Name: Total resolution time of 'Accepted + Wait' when it directly precedes 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Accepted + Wait' and activity 'Completed + Closed'
